headline: How Investors May Respond To MarketAxess Holdings (MKTX) Revealing Turnaround Progress and Growth at Barclays Event
summary: On September 9, 2025, MarketAxess Holdings Inc. presented at the Barclays 23rd Annual Global Financial Services Conference in New York, featuring remarks from CEO Christopher Robert Concannon. The company's latest public updates outlined a reversal of past business challenges, showing renewed revenue growth, stronger profitability, and expanding market share. We'll examine how recent signs of improving business fundamentals may impact the investment outlook for MarketAxess Holdings. Trump...
